meanings.sent1: The selenious mineral was shiny and gray.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the selenious properties of selenium.
meanings.sent3: The selenious scientist accidentally spilled selenium in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The selenious sky glowed with a mysterious light.
meanings.sent5: The selenious taste of selenium lingered on his tongue.

meanings.definition: Containing selenium in the +4 oxidation state.
meanings.sent1: The selenious compound reacted with the other elements.
meanings.sent2: The lab test confirmed the presence of selenious compounds.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly added selenious seasoning to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The selenious solution sparkled under the light.
meanings.sent5: The selenious smell of selenium filled the room.
